channel.title: CVE Feed for lodash -- lodash
channel.description: The latest CVEs for lodash -- lodash

item.title: CVE-2019-1010266|2024-08-05T03:07:18.476Z -- lodash -- lodash
item.description: lodash prior to 4.17.11 is affected by: CWE-400: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: Date handler. The attack vector is: Attacker provides very long strings, which the library attempts to match using a regular expression. The fixed version is: 4.17.11.
